author: Paul Thomas
comment: Perfect. Works great on ZenWatch 2. Just what I was looking for. Really like having Daily Text on my watch.

author: PuRe Dawn
comment: Looks OK but it doesn't open on phone to change language.

reply.author: Alex INC
reply.content: Hi there Dion!, sorry about that, but Im just a single developer so I haven't had the time, to setup multiple languages. Also this app is designed for Smart-Watches, like the moto 360 etc.

author: Shane Ryan
comment: Well done! Please update this for 2017 text before the new year too! :)
